players.name: Bob
memory: You investigated Diana and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Charlie: "I find it strange that Alice was the one found dead last night. Let's be vigilant and keep an eye on each other during this game."
Diana: "Let's work together to uncover any suspicious behavior. I'm keeping an eye on all of you."
Diana: "Let's all stay alert and be honest with each other. I, as the mafioso, will continue to monitor your actions closely."
You: "I agree with Charlie, let's all stay vigilant and keep an eye out for any suspicious behavior. As the detective, I will be closely monitoring everyone's actions and words."

Charlie: "I'm starting to feel uneasy about Bob's silence during the first discussion round. It's unusual for a villager to remain silent, especially when someone has been found dead. Let's keep a close eye on him."
